qa.question: Which English poet declined the post of Poet Laureate in 1757?

It mentions Colley Cibber as Poet Laureate from 1671-1757 and William Whitehead as Poet Laureate from 1757-1785. Notably, it states that the appointment was first offered to and declined by Thomas Gray in 1757.
